timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Mansarovar Public School was founded by educational visionary Mr. Rakesh Sharma with just 120 students and 15 teachers in a small rented building.

timeline.title: Expansion
timeline.description: The school moved to its current 5-acre campus with expanded facilities including a library, science labs, and sports fields. Student strength grew to over 500.

timeline.title: CBSE Affiliation
timeline.description: Mansarovar Public School received CBSE affiliation, marking a significant milestone in its academic journey. The first batch of Class 10 students graduated with excellent results.

timeline.title: Innovation & Technology
timeline.description: The school embraced digital education with smart classrooms and computer labs. A new modern building block was inaugurated with state-of-the-art facilities.

timeline.title: Silver Jubilee
timeline.description: Celebrated 25 years of excellence in education. The school was recognized for its academic achievements and contribution to the community.

timeline.title: Forward Looking
timeline.description: Today, Mansarovar Public School stands as a premier educational institution with over 1,500 students and 100 staff members, continuously evolving to meet future challenges.
